name: Princess Makeover - Fun Beauty Salon
description:
Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a damsel in distress named Cinderella. The cause of her distress? She had nothing to wear to the Prince's ball!

Become her own Fashion Fairy Godmother and create magical looks for her to capture the Prince's heart! With tons of elegant ball gowns and beautiful accessories to choose from, you can create the perfect princess look for Cinderella!

Don't let her meet the Prince looking like a pumpkin - help Cinderella find her happily ever after!
